surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: My father returned to the Marconi Company as Engineer in Chief in 1946.
sentences.chinese: 我的父親於1946年回到馬可尼公司任總工程師。
